revised_title: Physiological Actions and Antidotes of Colubrine and Viperine Snake Venoms
tldr: The author investigates the physiological actions and antidotes of colubrine and viperine snake venoms, focusing on the effects of various snake species on the respiratory system and circulation. The study also explores the effectiveness of Calmette's antivenin against different types of snake venom and suggests improvements for a more effective antivenom.
